title: Bus owners enraged after filling station closes in Panadura
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A group of Bus Owners who visitedthe Kulupana filling station to obtain Diesel, decided to block the Panadura – Horana main road at around 11.00 PM on Tuesday (29) night to protest against the non-supply of Diesel.
The protesters blocked the main road for about an hour, saying that even though there was diesel at the filling station, the filling station employees were NOT releasing diesel.
However, the Management of the filling station advised the Bus Owners that there are NO employees to dispense fuel after 10.00 PM.
The filling station management had informed the people in the queue that the Diesel would be released after the employees report back to work at 5.00 AM on Wednesday (30) morning.
Therefore, with the intervention of the Police, a filling station employee was brought back and the distribution of fuel was resumed.
